title: 2015 MRU Super League
text:
The MRU Super League 2015 was the 11th season of <a href="MRU%20Super%20League">MRU Super League</a>, <a href="Malaysia">Malaysia</a>'s domestic <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> competition. It kicked off on 17 February 2015. The final was held on 21 March 2015 and won by Keris Conlay, 18 - 11 over <a href="COBRA%20Rugby%20Club%20of%20Malaysia">COBRA</a>.
Teams.
A total of 12 teams will compete in the 2015 season.
Season.
In preliminary stage, all 12 teams were divided into 2 groups, and a single <a href="round-robin%20tournament">round-robin tournament</a> was held by both groups. Top 4 of each group were advanced to knockout stage, while the lowest placed team will be relegated to the National Inter-Club Championships (NICC) next year.
Standings.
Teams 1 to 4 (Green background) at the end of the preliminary competition rounds qualify for the final stage.
The lowest-placed teams (Red background) were eliminated to the 2016 National Inter-Club Championships.
